channel.title: Beta vulgaris on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Beta vulgaris on funPlantGenes

item.title: BvFL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BvFL1 Gene Name: FLC-like 1 Genome: Species: Beta vulgaris Functional Descriptions: EcoTILLING in Beta vulgaris reveals polymorphisms in the FLC-like gene BvFL1that are associated with annuality and winter hardiness.

item.title: Hs4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Hs4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Beta vulgaris Functional Description: The Hs4 gene constitutes a novel mechanism of plant resistance to nematodes Literature: A rhomboid-like protease gene from an interspecies translocation confers resistance to cyst nematodes.
